p: The antifungal activities of Salvia mirzayanii essential oil against fungi are exhibited in Table 3. For the clinical and standard tested yeasts MIC 50 and MIC 95 for the Salvia mirzayani essential oil were in the range of 0.03 to 1 and 0.06 to 2 Î¼L/mL, respectively, with Candida glabrata and Candida dubliniensis demonstrating the lowest MIC 50 and MIC 95 values.
